name: Mahoutsukai to Goshujin-sama: New Ground
storyline:
You're the princess of a magical kingdom. Everything is based on magic, and everyone can use magic...except you!
You have been sent on a trip to the nation's foremost magical academy: now you have 25 weeks to choose a personal servant from among its students -- or else lose your status forever.
summary: Mahoutsukai to Goshujin-sama ~Wizard and the Master~ New Ground is the first remake of Mahoutsukai to Goshujin-sama ~Wizard and the Master~. The remake adds updated art and voice acting for the characters. This version was released on the PC, then later on the PSP.
